Column.Name: Context EFormType
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Mailmerge] = TRUE, ISBLANK($thisValue) ), "Select a Context EForm", TRUE )

Column.Name: Forms with Merge Code Examples
Column.DefaultValueFormula: ARRAY( "Procurement - Procurement Plan", "Evaluation - Evaluation Report", "Payment Certificate - Payment Certificate Template", "Meeting - Meeting Agenda Template", "Meeting - Meeting Minutes Template", "Schedule of Rates - Schedule of Rates (Lump Sum)", "Schedule of Rates - Schedule of Rates (Rate Only)", "Information Request - Acknowledgement Letter", "Information Request - Access Charge Deposit Letter", "Information Request - Access Charge Letter", "Information Request - Decision Letter", "Information Request - Freedom of Information Processing Checklist" )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

Binding.Expression:
"
" & "" & /*HASH_GET([Icons], "leftArrow") & */"" & "Back to template dashboard" & "
"

Label.Text: For document generation VendorPanel provides a default template, this default template cannot be changed. The template can be download to take inspiration and copy merge code into your own template.
Upload your own custom templates to be used for document generation. If many documents are provided then the generation point will have a dropdown for users to select the appropriate template.
Upload your own custom templates to be used for document generation. If many documents are provided then the generation point will have a dropdown for users to select the appropriate template.
A merge code example document is provided so users can copy and paste merge codes from the examples into their own templates.

Binding.Expression: ARRAY_INDEXOF( [Forms with Merge Code Examples], [Context EFormType] & " - " & [Reference] ) > 0

TextCriterion.Text: STEP TO [Global Settings] ON ( ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Procurement Planning] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Procurement Planning') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Evaluations] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Evaluations') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Contracts] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Contracts') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Purchase Orders] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Purchase Orders') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Information Requests] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Information Requests') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Meetings and Actions] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Meetings and Actions') ) GET COUNT(0) > 0

STEP TO [Global Settings] ON ( ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Procurement Planning] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Procurement Planning') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Evaluations] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Evaluations') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Contracts] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Contracts') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Purchase Orders] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Purchase Orders') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Information Requests] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Information Requests') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Meetings and Actions] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Meetings and Actions') ) GET COUNT(0) > 0
